name: 4LP4K
description:
Synopsis:

Vinicius McGregor was a particular Alpaca. It was his birthday and he wanted to celebrate it with all his friends. He invited them, but no one accepted it. He waited, but no one appeared there. Since then, he is angry and sweared he would get his revenge.

Mechanics:

2D Shoot-em-up where you have eleminate all the enemies on the screen while the camera is advancing automatically through the level until confront the final boss.

Controls:
  1. Movement - A,W,S,D
  2. Shoot - Space bar
If you want to know more about our projects you can follow me at Twitter: Germán López
One of my partners who have collaborate in this project (Fernando Moreno - 3D artist) has a Twitter account so you can follow him aswell if you wish: Fernando Moreno

No more to say. I expect you to enjoy this game!
